description: NodeStatus is information about the current status of a node.

capacity.description: Capacity represents the total resources of a node. More info: http://kubernetes.io/docs/user-guide/persistent-volumes#capacity for more details.

addresses.description: List of addresses reachable to the node. Queried from cloud provider, if available. More info: http://releases.k8s.io/HEAD/docs/admin/node.md#node-addresses

nodeInfo.description: Set of ids/uuids to uniquely identify the node. More info: http://releases.k8s.io/HEAD/docs/admin/node.md#node-info

volumesAttached.description: List of volumes that are attached to the node.

allocatable.description: Allocatable represents the resources of a node that are available for scheduling. Defaults to Capacity.

volumesInUse.description: List of attachable volumes in use (mounted) by the node.

daemonEndpoints.description: Endpoints of daemons running on the Node.

phase.description: NodePhase is the recently observed lifecycle phase of the node. More info: http://releases.k8s.io/HEAD/docs/admin/node.md#node-phase The field is never populated, and now is deprecated.

images.description: List of container images on this node

conditions.description: Conditions is an array of current observed node conditions. More info: http://releases.k8s.io/HEAD/docs/admin/node.md#node-condition
